Package command

Class UpdateConsumerProfileCommand

java.lang.Object
command.UpdateProfileCommand
command.UpdateConsumerProfileCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICommand<java.lang.Boolean>
public class UpdateConsumerProfileCommand
extends UpdateProfileCommand
UpdateConsumerProfileCommand allows Consumers to update their account details and change the default Covid-19 preferences.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class command.UpdateProfileCommand

    successResult

  • Constructor Details

    • UpdateConsumerProfileCommand

      public UpdateConsumerProfileCommand​(java.lang.String oldPassword, java.lang.String newName, java.lang.String newEmail, java.lang.String newPhoneNumber, java.lang.String newAddress, java.lang.String newPassword, EventTagCollection newPreferences)
      Parameters:
      oldPassword - account password before the change, required for extra security verification. Must not be null
      newName - full name of the person holding this account. Must not be null
      newEmail - email address to use for this account. Must not be null
      newPhoneNumber - phone number to use for this account (used for notifying the Consumer of any Event cancellations that they have bookings for). Must not be null
      newAddress - updated Consumer address. Optional and may be null
      newPassword - password to use for this account. Must not be null
      newPreferences - a EventTagCollection object of Covid-19 preferences, used for filtering events in the ListEventsCommand. If null, default preferences are applied

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute​(Context context, IView view)
      Description copied from interface: ICommand
      This method should not be called directly outside of testing. Normal usage is to create a command object and execute it by passing to Controller.runCommand(ICommand) instead.
      Parameters:
      context - object that provides access to global application state
      view - allows passing information to the user interface
